description:
A multilingual YouTube Music frontend for Android, prioritize performance.

Fork of RiMusic, performance is our top priority.

Features:
  • Support multiple languages
  • Friendly designs
  • Cache or download songs for offline playback
  • Background playback
  • Statistics and reports (stored and process locally)
  • Various audio visualizers (some require mic permission, but disabled by default)
  • Sleep timer
  • Audio control: playback speed, pitch, normalization, skip silence
  • Support for Android Auto, Android TV, and YouTube video
  • Update notification
  • Export cached/downloaded songs
  • Save database and settings
  • Weekly update
  • Play music even when not connected to the internet
  • And many more...
